pli-tv-kd21:1.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.2: “ekamidāhaṁ, āvuso, samayaṁ pāvāya kusināraṁ addhānamaggappaṭipanno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.3: Atha khvāhaṁ, āvuso, maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisīdiṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro ājīvako kusinārāya mandāravapupphaṁ gahetvā pāvaṁ addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.5: Addasaṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso, taṁ ājīvakaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.11: Tatrāvuso, ye te bhikkhū avītarāgā appekacce bāhā paggayha kandanti, chinnapātaṁ papatanti, āvaṭṭanti, vivaṭṭanti—
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.12: atikhippaṁ bhagavā parinibbuto, atikhippaṁ sugato parinibbuto, atikhippaṁ cakkhuṁ loke antarahitanti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.13: Ye pana te bhikkhū vītarāgā te satā sampajānā adhivāsenti—
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.15: Atha khvāhaṁ, āvuso, te bhikkhū etadavocaṁ—
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.19: sabbeheva piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo aññathābhāvo.
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.20: Taṁ kutettha āvuso labbhā, yaṁ taṁ jātaṁ bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ palokadhammaṁ, taṁ vata mā palujjīti—
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.22: Tena kho panāvuso, samayena subhaddo nāma vuḍḍhapabbajito tassaṁ parisāyaṁ nisinno hoti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.23: Atha kho, āvuso, subhaddo vuḍḍhapabbajito te bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.28: idaṁ vo kappati, idaṁ vo na kappatīti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.29: Idāni pana mayaṁ yaṁ icchissāma taṁ karissāma, yaṁ na icchissāma na taṁ karissāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.30: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyāma.
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.33: pure adhammavādino balavanto honti, dhammavādino dubbalā honti;
pli-tv-kd21:1.1.34: pure avinayavādino balavanto honti, vinayavādino dubbalā hontī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.2.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo ekenūnapañcaarahantasatāni uccini.
pli-tv-kd21:1.2.4: “ayaṁ, bhante, āyasmā ānando kiñcāpi sekkho, abhabbo chandā dosā mohā bhayā agatiṁ gantuṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.2.5: Bahu ca anena bhagavato santike dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto.
pli-tv-kd21:1.2.6: Tena hi, bhante, thero āyasmantampi ānandaṁ uccinatū”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.2.7: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantampi ānandaṁ uccini.
pli-tv-kd21:1.3.2: “kattha nu kho mayaṁ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāmā”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.3.4: “rājagahaṁ kho mahāgocaraṁ pahūtasenāsanaṁ, yannūna mayaṁ rājagahe vassaṁ vasantā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma.
pli-tv-kd21:1.3.5: Na aññe bhikkhū rājagahe vassaṁ upagaccheyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.4.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṁ ñāpesi—
pli-tv-kd21:1.4.3: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho imāni pañca bhikkhusatāni sammanneyya—
pli-tv-kd21:1.4.4: rājagahe vassaṁ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṁ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṁ vasitabbanti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.4.8: rājagahe vassaṁ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṁ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṁ vasitabbanti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.4.9: Yassāyasmato khamati imesaṁ pañcannaṁ bhikkhusatānaṁ sammuti—
pli-tv-kd21:1.4.10: rājagahe vassaṁ vasantānaṁ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṁ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṁ vasitabbanti—
pli-tv-kd21:1.4.13: Sammatāni saṅghena imāni pañca bhikkhusatāni rājagahe vassaṁ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṁ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṁ vasitabbanti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.4.14: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.5.1: Atha kho therā bhikkhū rājagahaṁ agamaṁsu dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.5.4: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, paṭhamaṁ māsaṁ khaṇḍaphullaṁ paṭisaṅkharoma;
pli-tv-kd21:1.5.5: majjhimaṁ māsaṁ sannipatitvā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.5.6: Atha kho therā bhikkhū paṭhamaṁ māsaṁ khaṇḍaphullaṁ paṭisaṅkhariṁsu.
pli-tv-kd21:1.6.2: “sve sannipāto na kho metaṁ patirūpaṁ, yohaṁ sekkho samāno sannipātaṁ gaccheyyan”ti—
pli-tv-kd21:1.6.3: bahudeva rattiṁ kāyagatāya satiyā vītināmetvā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ “nipajjissāmī”ti kāyaṁ āvajjesi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.6.4: Appattañca sīsaṁ bibbohanaṁ, bhūmito ca pādā muttā.
pli-tv-kd21:1.6.5: Etasmiṁ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimucci.
pli-tv-kd21:1.6.6: Atha kho āyasmā ānando arahā samāno sannipātaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.7.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṁ ñāpesi—
pli-tv-kd21:1.7.3: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ upāliṁ vinayaṁ puccheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.7.6: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ āyasmatā mahākassapena vinayaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.7.7: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṁ upāliṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd21:1.7.14: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṁ upāliṁ paṭhamassa pārājikassa vatthumpi pucchi, nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, paññattimpi pucchi, anupaññattimpi pucchi, āpattimpi pucchi, anāpattimpi pucchi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.7.21: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṁ upāliṁ dutiyassa pārājikassa vatthumpi pucchi, nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, paññattimpi pucchi, anupaññattimpi pucchi, āpattimpi pucchi, anāpattimpi pucchi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.7.28: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṁ upāliṁ tatiyassa pārājikassa vatthumpi pucchi, nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, paññattimpi pucchi, anupaññattimpi pucchi, āpattimpi pucchi, anāpattimpi pucchi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.7.35: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṁ upāliṁ catutthassa pārājikassa vatthumpi pucchi, nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, paññattimpi pucchi, anupaññattimpi pucchi, āpattimpi pucchi, anāpattimpi pucchi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.8.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṁ ñāpesi—
pli-tv-kd21:1.8.3: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ ānandaṁ dhammaṁ puccheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.8.6: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ āyasmatā mahākassapena dhammaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.8.7: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd21:1.8.9: “Antarā ca, bhante, rājagahaṁ antarā ca nāḷandaṁ rājāgārake ambalaṭṭhikāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.8.12: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ brahmajālassa nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.8.17: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ sāmaññaphalassa nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando there bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.3: ‘ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhaneyyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.11: “cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā, terasa saṅghādisese ṭhapetvā, avasesāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.13: “cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā, terasa saṅghādisese ṭhapetvā, dve aniyate ṭhapetvā, avasesāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.15: “cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā, terasa saṅghādisese ṭhapetvā, dve aniyate ṭhapetvā, tiṁsa nissaggiye pācittiye ṭhapetvā, avasesāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.17: “cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā, terasa saṅghādisese ṭhapetvā, dve aniyate ṭhapetvā, tiṁsa nissaggiye pācittiye ṭhapetvā, dvenavuti pācittiye ṭhapetvā, avasesāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.19: “cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā, terasa saṅghādisese ṭhapetvā, dve aniyate ṭhapetvā, tiṁsa nissaggiye pācittiye ṭhapetvā, dvenavuti pācittiye ṭhapetvā, cattāro pāṭidesanīye ṭhapetvā, avasesāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.20: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṁ ñāpesi—
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.24: ‘idaṁ vo samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtiyānaṁ kappati, idaṁ vo na kappatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.25: Sace mayaṁ khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanissāma, bhavissanti vattāro—
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.27: Yāvimesaṁ satthā aṭṭhāsi tāvime sikkhāpadesu sikkhiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.28: Yato imesaṁ satthā parinibbuto, na dānime sikkhāpadesu sikkhantī’ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.29: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho apaññattaṁ nappaññapeyya, paññattaṁ na samucchindeyya, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vatteyya.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.34: ‘idaṁ vo samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtiyānaṁ kappati, idaṁ vo na kappatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.35: Sace mayaṁ khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanissāma, bhavissanti vattāro—
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.37: Yāvimesaṁ satthā aṭṭhāsi tāvime sikkhāpadesu sikkhiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.38: Yato imesaṁ satthā parinibbuto, na dānime sikkhāpadesu sikkhantī’ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.39: Saṅgho apaññattaṁ nappaññapeti, paññattaṁ na samucchindati, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattati.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.40: Yassāyasmato khamati apaññattassa appaññāpanā, paññattassa asamucchedo, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.42: Saṅgho apaññattaṁ nappaññapeti, paññattaṁ na samucchindati, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattati.
pli-tv-kd21:1.9.43: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.1: Atha kho therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.2: “idaṁ te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ bhagavantaṁ na pucchi—‘katamāni pana, bhante, khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī’ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.4: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante, assatiyā bhagavantaṁ na pucchiṁ—‘katamāni pana, bhante, khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī’ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.5: Nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmi, api cāyasmantānaṁ saddhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭan”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.6: “Idampi te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ bhagavato vassikasāṭikaṁ akkamitvā sibbesi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.8: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante, na agāravena bhagavato vassikasāṭikaṁ akkamitvā sibbesiṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.9: Nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmi, api cāyasmantānaṁ saddhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭan”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.10: “Idampi te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ mātugāmehi bhagavato sarīraṁ paṭhamaṁ vandāpesi, tāsaṁ rodantīnaṁ bhagavato sarīraṁ assukena makkhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.12: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante—māyimāsaṁ vikāle ahesunti—mātugāmehi bhagavato sarīraṁ paṭhamaṁ vandāpesiṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.13: Nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmi, api cāyasmantānaṁ saddhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭan”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.14: “Idampi te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ bhagavatā oḷārike nimitte kayiramāne, oḷārike obhāse kayiramāne, na bhagavantaṁ yāci—
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.15: ‘tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappaṁ, tiṭṭhatu sugato kappaṁ, bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan’ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.17: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante, mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto na bhagavantaṁ yāciṁ—
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.18: ‘tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappaṁ, tiṭṭhatu sugato kappaṁ, bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan’ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.19: Nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmi, api cāyasmantānaṁ saddhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭan”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.20: “Idampi te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṁ yaṁ tvaṁ mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye pabbajjaṁ ussukkaṁ akāsi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.22: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante, ayaṁ mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavato mātucchā āpādikā posikā khīrassa dāyikā bhagavantaṁ janettiyā kālaṅkatāya thaññaṁ pāyesīti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye pabbajjaṁ ussukkaṁ akāsiṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.10.23: Nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmi, api cāyasmantānaṁ saddhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭan”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.11.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā purāṇo dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ cārikaṁ carati mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.11.2: Atha kho āyasmā purāṇo therehi bhikkhūhi dhamme ca vinaye ca saṅgīte dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena rājagahaṁ yena veḷuvanaṁ kalandakanivāpo yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā therehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammoditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.11.3: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ purāṇaṁ therā bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd21:1.11.4: “therehi, āvuso purāṇa, dhammo ca vinayo ca saṅgīto.
pli-tv-kd21:1.11.7: Api ca yatheva mayā bhagavato sammukhā sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ, tathevāhaṁ dhāressāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.12.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando there bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd21:1.12.3: ‘tena hānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍaṁ āṇāpetū’”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.12.8: ‘Channo, ānanda, bhikkhu yaṁ iccheyya taṁ vadeyya.
pli-tv-kd21:1.12.9: Bhikkhūhi channo bhikkhu neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, nānusāsitabbo’”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.12.10: “Tena hāvuso ānanda, tvaṁyeva channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍaṁ āṇāpehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.12.11: “Kathāhaṁ, bhante, channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍaṁ āṇāpemi, caṇḍo so bhikkhu pharuso”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.12.12: “Tena hāvuso ānanda, bahukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ gacchāhī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.12.13: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭissutvā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi nāvāya ujjavanikāya kosambiṁ ujjavi, nāvāya paccorohitvā rañño udenassa uyyānassa avidūre aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.13.1: Tena kho pana samayena rājā udeno uyyāne paricāresi saddhiṁ orodhena.
pli-tv-kd21:1.13.3: “amhākaṁ kira ācariyo ayyo ānando uyyānassa avidūre aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisinno”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.13.4: Atha kho rañño udenassa orodho rājānaṁ udenaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd21:1.13.5: “amhākaṁ kira, deva, ācariyo ayyo ānando uyyānassa avidūre aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisinno.
pli-tv-kd21:1.13.6: Icchāma mayaṁ, deva, ayyaṁ ānandaṁ passitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.13.8: Atha kho rañño udenassa orodho yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.13.9: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho rañño udenassa orodhaṁ āyasmā ānando dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.13.10: Atha kho rañño udenassa orodho āyasmatā ānandena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito āyasmato ānandassa pañca uttarāsaṅgasatāni pādāsi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.13.11: Atha kho rañño udenassa orodho āyasmato ānandassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena rājā udeno tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.1: Addasā kho rājā udeno orodhaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.3: “api nu kho tumhe samaṇaṁ ānandaṁ passitthā”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.5: “Api nu tumhe samaṇassa ānandassa kiñci adatthā”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.6: “Adamhā kho mayaṁ, deva, ayyassa ānandassa pañca uttarāsaṅgasatānī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.8: “kathañhi nāma samaṇo ānando tāva bahuṁ cīvaraṁ paṭiggahessati.
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.9: Dussavāṇijjaṁ vā samaṇo ānando karissati, paggāhikasālaṁ vā pasāressatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.10: Atha kho rājā udeno yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ sammodi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.11: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.12: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā udeno āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.13: “āgamā nu khvidha, bho ānanda, amhākaṁ orodho”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.17: “Kiṁ pana bhavaṁ ānando tāva bahuṁ cīvaraṁ karissatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.18: “Ye te, mahārāja, bhikkhū dubbalacīvarā tehi saddhiṁ saṁvibhajissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.19: “Yāni kho pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakāni dubbalacīvarāni tāni kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.21: “Yāni pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakāni uttarattharaṇāni tāni kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.23: “Yā pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakā bhisicchaviyo tā kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.25: “Yāni pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakāni bhūmattharaṇāni tāni kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.27: “Yā pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakā pādapuñchaniyo tā kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.29: “Yāni pana, bho ānanda, porāṇakāni rajoharaṇāni tāni kathaṁ karissathā”ti?
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.30: “Tāni, mahārāja, koṭṭetvā cikkhallena madditvā paribhaṇḍaṁ limpissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.31: Atha kho rājā udeno—“sabbevime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā yoniso upanenti, na kulavaṁ gamentī”ti—
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.32: āyasmato ānandassa aññānipi pañca dussasatāni pādāsi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.14.33: Ayañcarahi āyasmato ānandassa paṭhamaṁ cīvarabhikkhā uppajji cīvarasahassaṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena ghositārāmo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.2: Atha kho āyasmā channo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.3: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ channaṁ āyasmā ānando etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.6: “Tvaṁ, āvuso channa, bhikkhū yaṁ iccheyyāsi taṁ vadeyyāsi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.7: Bhikkhūhi tvaṁ neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, nānusāsitabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.8: “Nanvāhaṁ, bhante ānanda, hato ettāvatā, yatohaṁ bhikkhūhi neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, nānusāsitabbo”ti tattheva mucchito papato.
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.9: Atha kho āyasmā channo brahmadaṇḍena aṭṭīyamāno harāyamāno jigucchamāno eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.10: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.11: brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.12: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.13: Aññataro ca panāyasmā channo arahataṁ ahosi.
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.14: Atha kho āyasmā channo arahattaṁ patto yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd21:1.15.16: “Yadaggena tayā, āvuso channa, arahattaṁ sacchikataṁ tadaggena te brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassaddho”ti.
pli-tv-kd21:1.16.1: Imāya kho pana vinayasaṅgītiyā pañca bhikkhusatāni anūnāni anadhikāni ahesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd21:1.16.3: Pañcasatikakkhandhako ekādasamo. Imamhi khandhake vatthū tevīsati.
